name: Comet Clash
description:
a Unique Arcade Shooter Set In Space

In Comet Clash, the goal is to keep comets from diminishing what’s left of your home planet’s population. You, the Space Cadet, take control of an enormous Space Shield that hovers around the planet on your command. The General is there to keep spirits high and more or less instruct you on how to control the Shield.

Features

  • 6 different comet types
  • Boss fights
  • Upgrades
  • Leaderboards
  • Narration
